definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]

sentences.english: It was from Shannon McDonald. cc: Frank Davis.
sentences.chinese: 新郵件來自夏儂麥當娜，並抄送了弗蘭克戴維斯。

sentences.english: Beyond that, Madonna made her first appearance on American Bandstand.
sentences.chinese: 此外，那年麥當娜首次亮相於美國音樂臺。

sentences.english: Madonna is a creative force of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 麥當娜是感情的原創力。

sentences.english: After a while Madonna realized that the way to the top for her was not going to be through pure modern dance.
sentences.chinese: 不久，麥當娜意識到單靠純現代舞是沒發展前途的。

sentences.english: Pretty soon after studying some time in the university of Michigan Madonna wanted to go to New York to chase her dreams.
sentences.chinese: 在密歇根州立大學學習不久，麥當娜想到紐約尋夢。

sentences.english: Madonna has a far profounder vision of sex than do the feminists.
sentences.chinese: 比起女權主義者，麥當娜對性有一個更加深遠的認識。

sentences.english: This time the controversy is that she's been non-controversial.
sentences.chinese: 這次的爭議在於麥當娜變得不具爭議性。

sentences.english: Here is Madonna's love letter … to hydrangeas.
sentences.chinese: 這就是麥當娜寫給繡球花的情書。

sentences.english: According to Madonna "the world has lost one of the greats".
sentences.chinese: 據麥當娜的說法“世界失去了一位偉大的天才”。

sentences.english: They have been outrageously negative about Madonna from the start.
sentences.chinese: 他們從一開始就已經完全發對麥當娜了。
麥當娜的妊娠期較爲順利。

sentences.english: Madonna, absent from the list last year, is No. 3.
sentences.chinese: 去年跌出排行的麥當娜今年排名第三。

sentences.english: Where can I find Madonna's new album?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪裏能找到麥當娜的新專輯？

sentences.english: I think what Madonna and I share is that we are both fearless. We both have a lot of nerve.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲我和麥當娜的共同點就是，我們天不怕地不怕。

sentences.english: This isn’t Madonna’s first directorial outing; she helmed a film called ‘Filth and Wisdom’ in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 這並非麥當娜首次執導。

definition: Grammy Award (US prize for music recording)/also written 格萊美獎|格莱美奖
